Muchen Sun's Course Note Template

A General-Purpose Template for Online Course Notes

This is my GitHub template repository for Online Course Notes. It’s based on the Jekyll theme “Cayman”.

Table of Contents

  • Note 1: Introduction
  • Note 2: $\LaTeX$ Support

$\LaTeX$ Support

Thanks to Haixing Hu’s tutorial and Gianluca Casati’s tutorial, I use Kramdown and MathJax to support in my posts.
